title: Game didn't load. End game statistics came up after a few minutes
body:
I Started a rank game, went into the loading screen. All champions were loaded to 100% including me, except for one player which was from the enemy team, i waited. Game takes ages to load, well... it actually does't load and straight away goes to the end match statistics where the title says 'Leaver (Remake)' I'm like, i didn't leave the game.

What happened?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a connection problem that's failing to reach the game servers, and you were stuck there long enough for a remake prompt to pass and take you to the post-game screen.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and resolve whatever is causing the block from happening.  Let me know if that clears things up!
